Package pmdd

Class PMDD

  • java.lang.Object
    • mdd.MDD
      • pmdd.PMDD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Allocable, Freeable
    public class PMDD
extends MDD
    The MDD with added properties.
    It extends the basic MDD, override the MDD() and Node() functions, and add functions specific to properties. The root node must at least be of type PNode !

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) static class  PMDD.Allocator
      The allocator that is in charge of the PMDD type.
      When not specified, the allocator has an initial capacity of 16.

      • propagateProperties

        public MapOf<java.lang.String,​NodeProperty> propagateProperties()
        TOPDOWN PROPAGATION
        Propagate all properties from the root node through the MDD to the tt node Clean all allocated properties during the run
        Returns:
        The map of name â†’ property of the tt node after the propagation

      • propagateProperties

        public MapOf<java.lang.String,​NodeProperty> propagateProperties​(boolean clean)
        TOPDOWN PROPAGATION
        Propagate all properties from the root node through the MDD to the tt node If clean is true, then the properties are cleaned after the propagation. Otherwise, nodes keep the properties even after the end of the algorithm.
        Parameters:
        clean - True if the properties must be free during the run, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        The map of name â†’ property of the tt node after the propagation

      • reversePropagateProperties

        public MapOf<java.lang.String,​NodeProperty> reversePropagateProperties()
        BOTTOMUP PROPAGATION
        Propagate all properties from the tt node through the MDD to the root node.
        Returns:
        The map of name â†’ property of the root node after the propagation

      • reversePropagateProperties

        public MapOf<java.lang.String,​NodeProperty> reversePropagateProperties​(boolean clean)
        BOTTOMUP PROPAGATION
        Propagate all properties from the tt node through the MDD to the root node. If clean is true, then the properties are cleaned after the propagation. Otherwise, nodes keep the properties even after the end of the algorithm.
        Parameters:
        clean - True if the properties must be free during the run, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        The map of name â†’ property of the root node after the propagation

      • getTtProperty

        public NodeProperty getTtProperty​(java.lang.String propertyName)
        Get the specified property from the tt node. Perform this after the propogateProperties operation (otherwise the tt node won't have any property)
        Parameters:
        propertyName - The name of the property to get
        Returns:
        the specified property from the tt node.
